ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have run into a problem during installation of cantera-1.7.0 on a linux box (intel, RH WS4, gf/gcc).  The problem appears to stem from the following

Hi all,

I have run into a problem during installation of cantera-1.7.0 on a linux
    box (intel, RH WS4, gf/gcc).  The problem appears to stem from the
    following failure:

"src/pycantera.cpp:22:34 numarray/arrayobject.h: No such file or directory"

This results in many errors during "make" and "make install"

I have installed "python2.5" and "numarray" prior to attempting to build
    cantera.

Any suggestions?

Many thanks,
Achilles
